items.sentence: Tom often goes to the restaurant where Mary works.

Our house will be demolished in two or three days.
Many deaf people don't like being called disabled.

Tom lives only three or four kilometers from here.

We have three children, three dogs and three cats.

Tom realized he wasn't the same as the other kids.
